name: 索尼娅·戴维斯
name_full: 索尼娅·戴维斯 Sonya Davis
birth_place: 美国,马萨诸塞州,贝弗利
introduction: Sonya Davis is an American actress born in Beverly, Massachusetts. She was raised in southern Oregon where she attended North Valley High School and was constantly involved in theater and choir shows. Sonya received her B.A. in Theater from the University of Oregon where she studied abroad in both Oviedo, Spain and for her final term, London, England. After graduating, Sonya moved to Los Angeles, California to pursue film and continue her acting education.
